snippet: Fourteen countries in Africa have the highest rates, while India has the highest number of such deaths, according to the report by the aid group Save the Children.
abstract: Save the Children report finds that 14 countries in Africa have the highest rates of first-day newborn deaths.
lead_paragraph: Fourteen countries in Africa have the highest rates, while India has the highest number of such deaths, according to the report by the aid group Save the Children.

headline.seo: Highest Rate of First-Day Deaths of Newborns in Africa
headline.main: Africa Holds Worst Rates for First-Day Baby Deaths, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Africa Has Worst Rates for Baby Deaths on First Day
